items.name: Throwing Knife
items.description: A razor sharp knife with a ring on the end, suitable for throwing.

items.name: Communicator Artifact
items.description: A heavy steel artifact used to contact other similar artifacts.

items.name: Amulet of Resurrection
items.description: A magical amulet that prevents the wearer from dying once.

items.name: Health Potion
items.description: A potion of crimson liquid that restores 15 health to the drinker.

items.name: Elemental sword
items.description: A shiny sword hilt that, when activated, forms a blade of the wielder's element.

items.name: Dwarven shield
items.description: A beautiful dwarven crafted large, red, rectangular shield.

items.name: Etherium helmet
items.description: A light helmet made of etherium that grants water breathing for up to two hours.

spells.name: Fireball
spells.description: Deal 8 damage disregarding defence to a target.
